samplesheet.description: Comma-separated file containing the columns 'id', 'bam', 'celltypes', 'mutations', and 'cell_barcodes'.

location.description: Are the BAMs saved locally or on iRODs?

genes.description: Text file of genes of interest, with one gene per line.

min_cov.description: Minimum coverage of a site in a cell for it to be genotyped.

no_celltypes.description: No celltype annotations in the samplesheet (`celltypes` column).

no_cell_barcodes.description: No cell barcodes in the samplesheet (`cell_barcodes` column).

no_chr.description: Is there a 'chr' prefix on the chromosome names?

refcds.description: Path to RefCDS Rda object from the dndscv package.

gencode_gff3.description: Path to a GENCODE GFF3 annotation file.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text:
These options are common to all nf-core pipelines and allow you to customise some of the core preferences for how the pipeline runs.

Typically these options would be set in a Nextflow config file loaded for all pipeline runs, such as `~/.nextflow/config`.
